channel.title: PatternPaint Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: PatternPaint 2.0.3
item.description:
Introducing PatternPaint 2.0. New support for BlinkyTile, BlinkyMatrix, and BlinkyPendant!
Changelog:
  • Save to BlinkyTile now working
  • Store multiple patterns to a BlinkyPendant
  • Now supports frame-based patterns in addition to scrolling ones- designed for matrix-style displays
  • Load multiple patterns and play them in slideshow format
  • Welcome screen to configure the device type, and load sample patterns
  • Sample patterns!
  • Improved firmware recovery mode for BlinkyTape

item.title: PatternPaint 1.8.0
item.description:
Introducing PatternPaint 1.8! This is a big one- now you can store multiple animations on your BlinkyTape at once!
Changelog:
  • New slideshow editor to load and manage multiple patterns
  • Upload multiple patterns to your BlinkyTape (BlinkyTile and BlinkyPendant coming soon)
  • Drag and drop support for loading animations directly from your file manager or favorite program
  • Automatically checks for new versions (using Sparkle and WinSparkle)
  • Mac: Appnap automatically disabled
